thread.title: iDashboards Acquires Diné College as New Customer
thread.title_full: iDashboards Acquires Diné College as New Customer

author: admin
title: iDashboards Acquires Diné College as New Customer
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 1:28 PM Companies mentioned in this article: iDashboards 
TROY, Mich. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- iDashboards, a Troy, Mich.-based pioneer in developing business intelligence dashboard solutions, announced today they have acquired Diné College, an Arizona-based, tribally-owned college that serves residents of the Navajo Nation in New Mexico, Arizona and Utah, as a new customer. iDashboards CEO Shadan Malik made the announcement. 
“At Diné College, it is our mission to continuously improve programs and services that exemplify a higher education,” said Velveena Davis, director of institutional effectiveness of Diné College. “The iDashboards solution allows us to better analyze and utilize the immense amount of data we possess to make better business decisions and pinpoint areas we can improve—ultimately contributing to the growth and success of the college.” 
Diné College vetted five different dashboard solutions that would best fit their needs, which include viewing capabilities, user management and cost. They ultimately selected iDashboards based on its ability to be customized, hold large amounts of data, and upload raw data and transform it into a visually engaging, easy-to-read format. iDashboards was rolled out to faculty, staff and students at the college’s First Annual Data Summit in Fall 2015, allowing them to engage with the dashboard firsthand. Diné College’s dashboards will be used to visually display and measure eight different Common Data Set topics throughout the college, including general information, enrollment and graduation rate, faculty size, course evaluation, campuses, institutional resources, student advising support program and community. 
“It’s a privilege to add Diné College, which serves as an inspiring and encouraging educational resource for members of the Navajo Nation, to our expanding client base,” said Malik. “At iDashboards, we’re dedicated to providing our clients and customers with dashboard solutions that are helpful both internally and externally, and we believe Diné College will benefit from this technology to help improve the educational experience for their students and employees.” 
iDashboards offers comprehensive dashboard solutions that can be customized to fit the needs of a variety of clients in a multitude of industries. For more information, visit www.idashboards.com . 
About iDashboards 
Headquartered in Troy, Mich., with customers in more than 40 countries worldwide, iDashboards provides easy-to-use, visually-appealing and cost-effective dashboard software for clients in a wide variety of industries—including higher education, health care, logistics, finance, manufacturing and more. With customizable and flexible dashboard solutions that easily integrate with key data sources, iDashboards clients can quickly and effectively view and analyze their critical performance metrics—ultimately leading to enhanced decision-making capabilities. For more information, visit www.idashboards.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150930006779/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
